thread.title: Holyrood pub held up by 3 armed men; patrons robbed
thread.title_full: Holyrood pub held up by 3 armed men; patrons robbed

author: cbc
title: Holyrood pub held up by 3 armed men; patrons robbed
text:
Three masked, armed men held up a pub in Holyrood on Wednesday night and demanded cash from staff and patrons.
The RCMP in Holyrood — about 40 kilometres outside of St. John's — were called to the armed robbery shortly before 10:30 p.m.
The men, who are described as Caucasian, in their early 20s and wearing hoodies and blue jeans, were last seen running towards the Holyrood Access Road at 10:40 p.m.
Police said the men got into a waiting vehicle.
Money was taken from customers, the cash register and the video lottery terminals.
There were no injuries reported following the robbery.
